quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Lenny Bruce and Statement
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, miami, obscenity. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which song by Evanescence on the album Origin includes these lyrics:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Where Will you Go

questions.question: Which song from the debut album of Evanescence includes these lyrics:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Whisper

questions.question: Which statement concerning Lenny Bruce is incorrect?

options.text: Lenny wrote a burlesque film in 1954.
Lenny recorded his first two albums at his own expense.
Lenny was a close friend of Frank Zappa and Phil Spector.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lenny recorded his first two albums at his own expense.

questions.question: Which statement about comedian Lenny Bruce is true?

options.text: Lenny and his wife Honey adopted one child, named Kitty.
Lenny and his wife Honey had no children.
Lenny and his wife Honey had three children named: Kitty Bruce, Holly Bruce, and  Lawrence Bruce.
Lenny and his wife Honey had one  daughter, Kitty Bruce.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lenny and his wife Honey had one  daughter, Kitty Bruce.

questions.question: What were the charges on which Lenny  Bruce was arrested in San Francisco in 1961?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Obscenity

questions.question: Lenny Bruce was arrested in 1951 in Miami, Florida on what charges?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Imitating a priest

questions.question: Which statement is  true about Lenny Bruce?

options.text: He was born Leonard Bruce Fried in The Bronx, New York.
He was born Leonard Alfred Friedman in Brooklyn, New York.
He was born Bruce Alfred Scheidermann in Babylon, Long Island, NY.
He was born Leonard Alfred Schneider in Mineola, Long Island, NY.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was born Leonard Alfred Schneider in Mineola, Long Island, NY.

questions.question: Lenny Bruce made a big name for himself at what famous North Beach venue?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Hungry i

questions.question: Select the correct statement concerning Lenny Bruce.

options.text: Lenny was a high school dropout.
Lenny attended Brooklyn College but did not graduate.
Lenny graduated from Brooklyn College with a degree in history.
Lenny attended Columbia College in New York but did not graduate.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lenny was a high school dropout.

questions.question: What was Lenny Bruces salary for his first comedy job?

options.text: $8 and a job as a waiter.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: $12 and a spaghetti dinner.

questions.question: Which statement about Lenny Bruce is correct?

options.text: Lenny was married and divorced twice.
Lenny Bruce was married to a woman, Honey Harlow, who was a stripper.
Lenny Bruce was never legally married.
Lenny Bruce was married four times and  divorced three times.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lenny was married and divorced twice.

questions.question: In 1964 Lenny Bruce was arrested for obscenity at what famous New York City club?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cafe Au Go Go

questions.question: On which TV show did Lenny Bruce make his debut?

options.text: The Tonight Show with Jack Paar

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Steve Allen Show

questions.question: Lenny Bruces father was born in England and his mother was a dancer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which song released by rock band Evanescence contains these lines:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Give Unto Me

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Hairstyles and Member

questions.question: This sports star happens to have his name on the side of a Vitamin Water bottle. He is known for his speed as well as his good looks.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kasey Kahne

questions.question: Elvis Presleys hairstyles have always been an inspiration for his fans and stylists alike. Which member of the Beatles and huge Elvis fan once said, Nothing really affected me until I heard Elvis. If there hadnt been an Elvis, there wouldnt have been a Beatles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Lennon

questions.question: Football player David Beckham, known for often changing his hairstyles, confessed that he is addicted to what sensation?

options.text: The tingling when he shaves his beard
The feeling of somebody cutting his hair
Feeling Victorias hair between his fingers

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The pain of needles

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cowbell

questions.question: Which Red Hot Chili Peppers band member dated Irish singer Sinead OConnor, known for her shaved head?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anthony Kiedis

questions.question: Danish dance-pop band Aqua was once famous for its members insanely unusual hairdos. What member of the band did lead vocalist Lene Nystrom marry in 2001?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of them

questions.question: Albert Einstein possessed one of the most talked about and copied hairstyles in history. How did he often handle curious people who stopped him in the street to ask questions about his theories?

options.text: He said, I would gladly talk to you, sir, but Im afraid I am late for my appointment.
He would start explaining his theories in a perplexing and totally confusing way
He would say, Pardon me, sorry! Always I am mistaken for Professor Einstein.
He would pretend that he did not hear.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He would say, Pardon me, sorry! Always I am mistaken for Professor Einstein.

questions.question: The following lyrics are from which song by Carbon Leaf?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One Day

questions.question: Which statement about Lenny Bruce is incorrect?

options.text: Lennys autobiography was titled How to Talk Dirty and Influence People.
Lennys last years were his most successful years as a comic.
Lenny died of a drug overdose in Hollywood in 1966.
Lennys last years were filled with increasing use of narcotics.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lennys last years were his most successful years as a comic.
